Have the following php code:

 <?php
define('CUP','big_cup');

function tea($cups){
    echo $cups.' of tea';
}
class coffe{
   private $sugar;
   public  $milk;
   const WATER_TEMP = 90;
 
 /**
 * This is constructor
 *
 * @param int $water_temp
 */
 
   function cofee($sugar){
         /* No Sugar */
         $this->sugar = $sugar; //  sugar free
   }

}
//TODO add type of coffee
$coffee = <<< HEREDOC
 Testy Coffee
HEREDOC;
tea(10);
?>
